input_args.passage: 'Carl Wieland - Wikipedia | Carl Wieland (born 1950) is an Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker. He was the managing director of Creation Ministries International (formerly Answers in Genesis - Australia), a Creationist apologetics ministry., Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker'
input_args.claim: 'CMI is a creationist apologetics ministry and takes the stand that the earth is thousands of years old, based on a straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
